## ChampionManager class

A champion manager - to fetch and manage all the champion data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChampionManager implements BaseManager<Champion> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Champion](./shieldbow.champion.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, cacheSettings)](./shieldbow.championmanager._constructor_.md) |  | Create a new Champions Manager |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.championmanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [Champion](./shieldbow.champion.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The champions cached in the memory. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.championmanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client that this manager belongs to. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(id, options)](./shieldbow.championmanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetches a champion (from the cache, if already available), or from data dragon and community dragon. |
|  [fetchAll()](./shieldbow.championmanager.fetchall.md) |  | Fetch all the champions and store it in the cache.<!-- -->This always fetches freshly from data dragon and community dragon. |
|  [findByKey(key)](./shieldbow.championmanager.findbykey.md) |  | Find a champion by their 3-digit key. |
|  [findByName(name)](./shieldbow.championmanager.findbyname.md) |  | Find a champion by their name (instead of ID, which is very similar but not the same as the name). The search is case-insensitive. The special characters are NOT ignored. |
